user_input: What is the battery life of the Advantech EVA-2311 sensor and under what conditions is this achieved?
response: The Advantech EVA-2311 sensor has a battery life of up to 5 years, achieved with a 15-minute data transmission interval at 25°C.
retrieved_contexts: Battery life up till 5 years @25°C, 15mins interval setting
EVA-2311 is powered by 2 AA 3.6v Li-ion batteries, battery life can up till 5 years basing on certain condition
reference: The Advantech EVA-2311 sensor has a battery life of up to 5 years, achieved with a 15-minute data transmission interval at 25°C.

user_input: What is the full temperature detection range of the EVA-2311 sensor?
response: The EVA-2311 sensor has a temperature detection range from -70°C to 200°C.
retrieved_contexts: IP67 rating design with -70°C to 200°C temperature detection range
reference: The temperature detection range for the Advantech EVA-2311 is -70°C to 200°C.

user_input: What wireless communication technology does the EVA-2311 use?
response: The EVA-2311 uses LoRaWAN wireless communication technology.
retrieved_contexts: EVA-2311 is a LoRaWAN PT1000 round head probe sensor
reference: The EVA-2311 sensor uses LoRaWAN wireless communication technology.

user_input: What is the accuracy of the Advantech EVA-2311 when the host and sensor are in the same environment?
response: The accuracy of the Advantech EVA-2311 when the host and sensor are in the same environment is ±0.8°C between 0°C and 55°C.
retrieved_contexts: Accuracy (Host and Sensor are in same environment) ±0.8°C between 0°C and 55°C
reference: The accuracy of the Advantech EVA-2311 is ±0.8°C between 0°C and 55°C when the host and sensor are in the same environment.

user_input: What are the available LoRaWAN frequency bands for the EVA-2311?
response: The EVA-2311 supports EU 863-870 MHz, US 902-928 MHz, AU 915-928 MHz, and AS 919-924 MHz frequency bands.
retrieved_contexts: Frequency Band EU 863-870 (MHz) / US 902-928 (MHz) / AU 915-928 (MHz) / AS 919-924 (MHz)
EVA-2311-NA LoRaWAN Temperature PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor - US 902-928 (MHz)
EVA-2311-EA LoRaWAN Temperature PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor - EU 863-870 (MHz)
EVA-2311-TA LoRaWAN Temperature PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor - AS 919-924 (MHz)
EVA-2311-ZA LoRaWAN Temperature PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor - AU 915-928 (MHz)
reference: The EVA-2311 supports EU 863-870, US 902-928, AU 915-928, and AS 919-924 MHz frequency bands.

user_input: What is the length of the probe cable for the EVA-2311?
response: The EVA-2311 probe cable is 2000 mm (2 meters) long.
retrieved_contexts: The extended sensor itself has 2m length cable
LoRaWAN Temperature PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor with 2m cable
reference: The Advantech EVA-2311 probe cable is 2000 mm long.

user_input: What are the storage temperature and humidity limits for the EVA-2311?
response: The storage limits for the EVA-2311 are -40°C to 85°C temperature and 0% to 90% RH humidity.
reference: The storage limits for the EVA-2311 are -40°C to 85°C and 0% to 90% RH.

user_input: What type of temperature probe does the EVA-2311 use?
response: The EVA-2311 uses a PT1000 round head probe for temperature measurement.
retrieved_contexts: LoRaWAN Temperature PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor
EVA-2311 is a LoRaWAN PT1000 round head probe sensor
IP67 for PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor
reference: The Advantech EVA-2311 uses a PT1000 probe.

user_input: What is the transmit power of the Advantech EVA-2311?
response: The transmit power of the Advantech EVA-2311 is up to 20dBm.
reference: The transmit power of the Advantech EVA-2311 is up to 20dBm.

user_input: What is the accuracy formula for different environments between -70°C and 0°C?
response: The accuracy of the EVA-2311 in different environments between -70°C and 0°C is ±{(0.15 + 0.002 * |T2|) + 1}°C.
retrieved_contexts: Accuracy (Host and Sensor are in different environment) ±{(0.15 + 0.002* |T2|)+1}°C between -70°C and 0°C
Temperature accuracy specifications for different environments
reference: The accuracy of the EVA-2311 in different environments between -70°C and 0°C is ±{(0.15 + 0.002 * |T2|) + 1}°C.

user_input: What are the dimensions and IP rating of the EVA-2311 main unit?
response: The EVA-2311 main unit has dimensions of 112 x 51 x 71.5 mm (H x W x D) and an IP30 rating.
retrieved_contexts: Dimension (H x W x D): 112 x 51 x 71.5 mm
General specifications of the main unit
reference: The dimensions of the Advantech EVA-2311 are 112 x 51 x 71.5 mm with IP30 rating.

user_input: Is the EVA-2311 CE and FCC certified for wireless operation?
response: Yes, the EVA-2311 is CE (RED) and FCC certified, along with TELEC, RCM, and NCC certifications.
retrieved_contexts: Certification: CE (RED), FCC, TELEC, RCM, NCC
reference: The Advantech EVA-2311 holds CE (RED), FCC, TELEC, RCM, and NCC certifications.

user_input: Does the EVA-2311 have LED indicators and what do they show?
response: Yes, the EVA-2311 has LED indicators that show power on, TX (transmission), and reset to default status.
retrieved_contexts: LED Indicator: Power on, TX, reset to default
reference: The LED on the EVA-2311 indicates power on, transmission (TX), and reset.

user_input: What is the configuration interface for the EVA-2311?
response: The EVA-2311 uses wireless downlink commands as its configuration interface.
reference: Configuration of the Advantech EVA-2311 is done via wireless downlink commands.

user_input: What mounting options are available for the EVA-2311?
response: The EVA-2311 can be mounted using wall, magnetic, or pole mounting options.
reference: The EVA-2311 supports wall, magnetic, and pole mounting.

user_input: What type of power source does the EVA-2311 require?
response: The EVA-2311 requires 2 AA 3.6V lithium batteries for power operation (batteries not included).
retrieved_contexts: EVA-2311 is powered by 2 AA 3.6v Li-ion batteries
reference: The EVA-2311 requires 2 AA 3.6V batteries (not included).

user_input: What is the operating temperature and humidity range for the EVA-2311?
response: The EVA-2311 operates in a temperature range of -20°C to 55°C and humidity range of 0% to 90% RH.
reference: The EVA-2311 operates in -20°C to 55°C and 0% to 90% RH conditions.

user_input: What is the communication range of the EVA-2311 LoRaWAN sensor?
response: The EVA-2311 can transmit data over hundreds to thousands of meters using LoRaWAN technology with up to 20dBm transmit power.
retrieved_contexts: data transmission range can up till hundred or thousand meters away
reference: The EVA-2311 has a transmission range of hundreds to thousands of meters using LoRaWAN.

user_input: What applications is the EVA-2311 specifically designed for?
response: The EVA-2311 is designed for temperature monitoring in refrigerators, freezers, cooling pipes, and cold chain applications.
retrieved_contexts: capable to measure temperature at different kinds of applications, such like refrigerator, freezer, cooling pipe
Temperature detection range suitable for various cooling applications
reference: Typical applications for the EVA-2311 include monitoring refrigerators, freezers, and cooling pipes.

user_input: What probe specifications does the EVA-2311 have?
response: The EVA-2311 probe has PT1000 sensor type, 5 x 30 mm dimensions, IP67 rating, and 2000 mm cable length.
retrieved_contexts: LoRaWAN Temperature PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor
reference: The EVA-2311 probe is PT1000 type, 5x30mm, IP67 rated with 2000mm cable.
